commit message: adding placeholder ui for new library communications model
switching to using exchange-android and git submodule for messenger and demo

removed redundant background notifications

- moved startup internet check to passphrase validation
- removed unnecessary “internet not available” when app is in the
background
- removed backup reminder notification, it is annoying, and otherwise
sufficient to just the the settings for last backup success time

moved intrinsic lock to more consistent locations around core database operations

- Closes #110, IllegalStateException in RecipientDbAdapter.
updating to latest exchange repo master

fixed rare startup crash before registration occurs

- Closes #134, NullPointerException during getMessageNoncesByToken.
Fixed emoji display issue for Android 2.3 devices.
upgrading connection to HttpsURLConnection for API 23
